title: close does not work on netchannels
body:
by **dzhelil**: 
To reproduce the problem, compile the attached programs, run exporter, and then run
importer. 

The expected output is that exporter should terminate once importer is done, because
squareCh is closed on importer side.

What we see instead is that exporter continues to run.

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
Ubuntu 11.04

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
1b38d90eebcd (release-branch.r58) release/release.r58
Attachments: 1. exporter.go (626 bytes) 1. importer.go (743 bytes)
